summary: This is not a texture replacement. This mod contains new textures connected to independent horse models.
descriptionHtml:
-------------
CONTENT
-------------
***********************************************************************************

***Version Update 1.1***

Horses should no longer run \"home\" when you dismount!

*************************************************************************************

This is not a texture replacement. This mod contains new textures connected to independent horse models. You can find them near the bridge at Riverwood. 

The colors included are:

Sabino
Buckskin
Blue Roan

I am currently working on a high resolution horse texture collection, so keep an eye out! Not literally though. That would hurt; please don\'t do that.

[center] ***PLEASE NOTE: The Unique Horse Texture Replacement version of this mod will not work with the two High Resolution Texture Pack plugins enabled!***
But you can look here: [b] http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/555122-is-the-skyrim-high-resolution-texture-pack-worth-it/ [/b] for a work-around. [/center] 

-------------------
INSTALLATION
-------------------

Please install the included folders into your Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------
UNINSTALL
--------------

Remove the following files from your Skyrim/Data/textures/actors folder:

-e7horse folder and contents

Remove the following files from your Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/horse/character assets folder: 

-the e7 file folder and all contents 
-any e7 loose files!


--------------------------
TROUBLESHOOTING
---------------------------

Please contact me if you have any problems or concerns. I have had texture files corrupt and change when moving them between computers, so please let me know if this happens to you! It shouldn\'t though. Don\'t worry!

-------
Enjoy!
----------------------------------------------------------
|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
----------------------------------------------------------
author: e7seif
